item.title: Help is growing for the heavy emotional toll cancer takes on young men
item.description: Coping with cancer and its aftermath isn't easy for anyone. But men tend to isolate more, seek less support and, alarmingly, die earlier than women. Y...

item.title: The hidden costs of cutting Medicaid
item.description: Cutting Medicaid can seem like an easy way to slash the budget. But, the costs can spread to all of us.

item.title: Why lung cancer is a 'hidden epidemic' in this part of the world
item.description: Rates of the world's deadliest cancer appear to be low in sub-Saharan Africa. But that statistic is masking the scope of the disease, doctors say.

item.title: Women who have experienced stalking have a higher risk of heart disease, study shows
item.description: A big, new study shows women who are victims of stalking are at significantly higher risk of heart disease.

item.title: The emotional impact of cancer on men
item.description: Coping with cancer and its aftermath isn't easy for anyone. But men tend to fare worse emotionally and physically. They isolate more, seek less suppor...
